>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You’re proficient with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.pcSmuTD42jh8G9A2]{disintegration lashes} (Armory 10), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.jemra7M2JviruVyQ]{monowhips}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.PCazCerC2kBZZUZK]{plasma lashes}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.i1TzAckpWM4zydbT]{taclashes}, and similar one-handed, whip-like advanced melee weapons (at the GM’s discretion). You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.9Us7Eg9cAoq3BcS5]{Weapon Specialization (Combat)} in these weapons as if your class granted proficiency, and you can use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{Trick Attack (Ex)} with these weapons. You don’t add trick attack damage to your attack, but the target is still @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed}, and you can use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.bhSrjkuWxz2DQHXC]{Debilitating Trick (Ex)}. You can choose to deal lethal damage with such weapons if they normally deal nonlethal damage.
